alert.note: Alert for Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Meigs, central Mason, southwestern Wirt, northwestern Roane, Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Racine, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Pomeroy, Racine, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Sandyville, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Leon, Portland, Statts Mills, Given, Reedsville, Cottageville, Fairplain, Mount Alto, Peewee and Southside. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 127 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
